title: LUX IS BUGGED -- DISABLE HER NOW
body:
For some reason my E bugged out and I literally couldn't use it for the last 20 minutes of a 30 minute game.

It was greyed out like I never had a level in it. I lost the ranked game, no loss forgiven. Fix her, disable her. Do whatever. Get the word out, seriously Riot. I would post the screen shot I just took -- but wait! You can't take screen shots while on league for some reason, so I have nothing to upload.
